title: L-edge Soft X-ray Self-absorption Structure (SX-SAS) Observation of the First Transition Elements
content: Soft X-ray spectrometers equipped with varied line spaced grating and CCD for low-energy X-rays are used as a method of chemical bonding state analysis. Parallel detection provides to observe multiple soft X-ray spectra simultaneously with high energy resolution, high signal-to-noise ratio and good reproducibility. In particular, chemical bonding information, including the valence band, can be performed by laboratory-scale microscopic observations [3].
